original: Blomquist, Åke Bertil Fredrik, stadsingenjör, Karlskrona, f. 2/11/07 i Kalmar av Richard B. o. Sigrid Kristina Jonsson. G. 36 m. Märta Björkdahl. Barn: Britt-Louise f. 38, Cla-rence (Nicke) 42. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. real 29, civ:ing:ex. v. CTH (VoV) 34. Arb:led. h. priv. byggn :firmor i Gbg 34-36, bitr. stadsing. i Åmål 36-37, e. ing. v. byggn :kont. i Karlskrona 37-39, mätn :man h. byggn :ndn i Borås 39-40, stadsing. i Sala 40-43, stads- o. hämning, i Karlskrona sed. 43. Led. av komm. f. inrätt, av tekn. gymn. i Karlskrona 46, led. av bygg-n :komm. f. samma sak 46, l’ed. av styr. f. h. tekn. gymn. i Karlskr. 47, sekr. o. skattmäst. i Sala tekn. fören. 42 o. 43.
translated: Blomquist, Åke Bertil Fredrik, city engineer, Karlskrona, born November 2nd, 1907 in Kalmar to Richard B. and Sigrid Kristina Jonsson. Married in 1936 to Märta Björkdahl. Children: Britt-Louise born in 1938, Cla-rence (Nicke) born in 1942. He graduated from Gothenburg higher real school in 1929, and from Chalmers University of Technology (VoV) with a degree in civil engineering in 1934. He worked as a supervisor for private construction firms in Gothenburg from 1934 to 1936, an assistant city engineer in Åmål from 1936 to 1937, a engineer at a building office in Karlskrona from 1937 to 1939, a surveyor for the building authority in Borås from 1939 to 1940, a city engineer in Sala from 1940 to 1943, and a city engineer and supervisor in Karlskrona from 1943 onwards. He was a member of the committee for technical high schools in Karlskrona in 1946, a member of the building committee for the same in 1946, a member of the board of directors for the technical high school in Karlskrona in 1947, and secretary and treasurer of the technical association in Sala in 1942 and 1943.

memberOf.name: Committee for Technical High Schools in Karlskrona
Board of Directors for the Technical High School in Karlskrona
Secretary and Treasurer of the Technical Association in Sala
